snippet.title: Mega Man 9 (Extra 2) - Superhero Mode
snippet.description: This is something that I feel warrants its own video, partly because Superhero mode makes quite a few changes to the stages. Sadly, the bosses remain unaltered by Superhero mode. The changes that are made in superhero mode make the game much more difficult and actually alter the stages in a surprising amount of ways. There's also hero mode which is basically a toned down version of superhero mode. Either way, it's pretty fun and definitely demands the use of your special weapons. It's what makes it more enjoyable than 10's hard mode.
